channel.title: Personal on Joshua Loyal
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Joshua Loyal

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: This is the launch of the blog on my personal site. I am still not sure what this blog will contain. In fact, I am starting this blog to develop my writing voice and style. However, I know that it will primarily be a place I can expand on ideas relevant to my research and work interests. So expect to read a lot of musings on statistical concepts, data science topics, coding tricks, software libraries, and current trends in machine learning.
